infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: MyKliq needs camera access to take photos and videos for posts and stories.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MyKliq needs photo library access to select photos and videos for posts and stories.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: MyKliq needs microphone access for video recording and voice messages.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: MyKliq needs your location to show nearby meetups and check-in at locations.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow MyKliq to access your camera to take photos and videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow MyKliq to access your photos to share with your kliq.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow MyKliq to use your location for nearby meetups and check-ins.
